api_list.description: Query GP data using Catalog Number (CATNR).
Submit a data request for earthquake events.

optional_parameters.name: starttime
optional_parameters.description: Limit events on or after the specified start time.

optional_parameters.name: endtime
optional_parameters.description: Limit events on or before the specified end time.

optional_parameters.name: minmagnitude
optional_parameters.description: Limit to events with a magnitude larger than the specified minimum.

query: Can you find information about the satellite with catalog number 25544 and also provide details about earthquakes that occurred on the date on the powerpoint slide with a magnitude greater than 5?
